::Aerotaur::
    He glances at Trinity briefly.  Then looks back to Arrow.  "Officially 
yes it would be bad.  Unofficially..."  He raises his bow and fires an arrow 
just to the left of Hero's feet.  "Sorry Hero.  I slipped."  He smirks at 
Arrow.  He then turns to talk to Trinity.  "I don't think there's much to do 
right now but when someone else attacks you'll be important to the defense."
